alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 6:58PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CHATHAM AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 658 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Wassaw Island, or 8 miles southeast of Coffee Bluff, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Tybee Island, Wilmington Island, Fort Pulaski National Monument, Midtown Savannah, Montgomery, Thunderbolt, Skidaway Island and Isle Of Hope. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.
